name: adc_ltm_poolmember_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMPoolMemberList():
    '''
    To get the list of LTM Pool member 

    '''

    ltm_pool_member_list = []
    db_filter = {'code': 'lpm'}
    adc_ltm_pool_member_list = connect_db.appviewx.ro.find(db_filter)
    for device in adc_ltm_pool_member_list:
        ltm_pool_member_list.append(device)
    return ltm_pool_member_list
description: To get a list of LTM poolmember
_keywords: To get a list of LTM poolmember
